name: The Return of Color
description:
In this game, you have to change the season from winter to spring by restoring the color to Robo Island. along the way, there are many challenges and obstacles.

This game was made for a game jam, but I think I might even continue it if it gets good ratings.  It might come out slow though because I am 13 and have to deal with school. This is my first game jam, I hope you enjoy the game!

If this game lags in the browser, then you can download the windows game to make it not lag.
